title: >>> The Email HOME
body_text:
A venue has finally been chosen! For all you Wall High School fans out there, get ready because DODGEBALL 38 will NOT be played there!
For those who were online this past Tuesday, a mass email was sent out at 3:44PM stating the following:
CHOOSE THE LOCATION for DODGEBALL 38!
The first person to send (John) an email will get to choose the location for DODGEBALL 38!
*The email must say either Ocean Road Park or Wall High School*
Just send an email with either location, be the first one to do it, and the location is yours!
Well the results are in and thanks to one high-flyin' Derek Carty, Ocean Road Park will host DODGEBALL 38. Derek emailed John back a mere nine minutes after the mass email was sent. Valerie Winston came in second at 5:51PM, hoping for Wall High School. Although he finished third, Ryan McCrorey still got what he wanted, that being Ocean Road Park. His email came at 7:26.
DODGEBALL 38
Ocean Road Park
6:30 Start Time
